title: TMDb Comprehensive Scraper
description: Scrape comprehensive movie, TV show, and peopl...(TMDb). Supports API access with fallback to website scraping.

apiKey.title: TMDb API Key (Optional)
apiKey.description: Your TMDb API key (v3 auth). If provided, ...e scraping. Get one at https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api

useApiFirst.title: Use API First (when available)
useApiFirst.description: If true and API key is provided, attempts to use TMDb API first. If false, uses website scraping as primary and API for fallbacks.

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: Type of content to scrape: movies, TV shows, people, or both movies and TV shows.

searchQueries.title: Search Queries
searchQueries.description: Comma-separated list of search terms to query TMDb for. Each query will be searched separately.

genreIds.title: Genre IDs
genreIds.description: Comma-separated TMDb genre IDs to filter by. F... For TV: 10759=Action&Adventure, 16=Animation, 35=Comedy, etc.

peopleQuery.title: People Search Query (Optional)
peopleQuery.description: Optional comma-separated list of people search terms, to collect people data via API (if API key provided).

resultsWanted.title: Maximum Results
resultsWanted.description: Maximum number of content items to collect per search query.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of API result pages to fetch (each page contains ~20 items).

sortBy.title: Sort By
sortBy.description: Sorting for discover endpoints when using filters (see TMDb discover API docs).

minVoteCount.title: Minimum Vote Count
minVoteCount.description: Minimum number of votes for discover filters (to avoid very obscure content).

minVoteAverage.title: Minimum Vote Average
minVoteAverage.description: Minimum average vote for discover filters.

collectPeople.title: Collect people data (API)
collectPeople.description: If true and API key provided, collects people/credits info for content items and/or people search queries.

collectReviews.title: Collect reviews (API)
collectReviews.description: If true and API key provided, collects user reviews for each content item.

collectImages.title: Collect images metadata (API)
collectImages.description: If true and API key provided, collects backdrops, posters, and profile image metadata.

collectKeywords.title: Collect keywords (API)
collectKeywords.description: If true and API key provided, collects keywords/tags associated with content.

collectVideos.title: Collect videos (API)
collectVideos.description: If true and API key provided, collects videos/trailers metadata.

collectWatchProviders.title: Collect watch providers (API)
collectWatchProviders.description: If true and API key provided, collects watch providers (streaming platforms) data.

minDelayMs.title: Minimum delay between requests (ms)
minDelayMs.description: Minimum random delay between HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

maxDelayMs.title: Maximum delay between requests (ms)
maxDelayMs.description: Maximum random delay between HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

maxConcurrency.title: Maximum concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent detail requests (API or web).

requestTimeoutMs.title: Request timeout (ms)
requestTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for HTTP requests in milliseconds.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (datacenter recommended for TMDb).
